title: <ExtPivotd3container></ExtPivotd3container>

docProperties.name: configurator
docProperties.text: Configuration object for the pivot Configurator plugin.

docProperties.name: drawing
docProperties.text: Configuration object for the item that will be added to this container

docProperties.name: matrix
docProperties.text:
This is the pivot matrix used by the pivot D3 container. All axis and aggregate
dimensions should be defined here.

Needed by this pivot container so that the configurator plugin can call getMatrix.

This matrix is also used by the {@link #cfg!drawing #drawing}.

propertyString:
configurator
  import React, { Component } from 'react';
  import { ExtPivotd3container } from "@sencha/ext-react-modern";

    render() {
      return (
        <ExtPivotd3container configurator=''></ExtPivotd3container>
      )
    }
  }
drawing
  import React, { Component } from 'react';
  import { ExtPivotd3container } from "@sencha/ext-react-modern";

    render() {
      return (
        <ExtPivotd3container drawing=''></ExtPivotd3container>
      )
    }
  }
matrix
  import React, { Component } from 'react';
  import { ExtPivotd3container } from "@sencha/ext-react-modern";

    render() {
      return (
        <ExtPivotd3container matrix=''></ExtPivotd3container>
      )
    }
  }
text:
his container can host D3 components that need a pivot configurator
plugin.
